languages.text: "Я продолжу изучение памяти блаженного мученика с приличествующим почтением".
"I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."
languages.original_text: "Я продолжу изучение памяти блаженного мученика с приличествующим почтением".

traits.locale_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我会怀着应有的敬意，继续研究这位受祝福的烈士的记忆。”
languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."

traits.locale_text: “我会怀着应有的敬意，继续研究这位受祝福的烈士的记忆。”

languages.text: «Continuaré investigando la memoria del bendito mártir con la debida reverencia».
languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."

traits.locale_text: «Continuaré investigando la memoria del bendito mártir con la debida reverencia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「祝福された殉教者の記憶について、私は敬虔な気持ちで研究を続けよう」
languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福された殉教者の記憶について、私は敬虔な気持ちで研究を続けよう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde den Speicher des gesegneten Märtyrers mit aller gebotenen Ehrerbietung weiter erforschen."
languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde den Speicher des gesegneten Märtyrers mit aller gebotenen Ehrerbietung weiter erforschen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je vais continuer à explorer la mémoire du martyr béni, avec tout le respect qui lui est dû. »
languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais continuer à explorer la mémoire du martyr béni, avec tout le respect qui lui est dû. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış şehidin belleğindeki araştırmalarıma tüm hürmetimle devam edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I will continue my research into the blessed martyr's memory with all due reverence."
